hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"When (a man) sits between the four parts of his wife's body and exerts himself, then Ghusl becomes obligatory." Abu 'Abdur-Rahman said: "This is a mistake what is correct is; 'Ash'ath from Al-Hasan, from Abu Hurairah.' An-Nadr bin Shumail, and others, reported the Hadith from Shu'bah just as Khalid reported it

chapter.ara-name: باب وُجُوبِ الْغُسْلِ إِذَا الْتَقَى الْخِتَانَانِ
chapter.eng-name: The Obligation Of Ghusl When The Two Circumcised Parts Meet
